website_summaries.verdict: A solid set, though it has fewer wrenches, lesser quality, and a higher price than some other choices.
pros: Easy to switch back and forth when ratcheting side is needed
Handsome tools with a sleek chrome finish
cons: Pricey, yet the set includes only 13 tools
The measurements of some wrenches may be inaccurate

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality Control
customer_reviews.text: 2 out of 3 GearWrench items were received defective from the same order. One was from 13 piece SAE ratcheting set, the 13/16 ratchet is in pieces, like they forgot to assembly it! The other is a 32mm ratcheting wrench that has an issue with the ratcheting mechanism, it frequently locks and you have to jiggle it around a bit to make it work again. I have not gotten to actually use any of these items yet, all of this was just noticed from a brief inspection after opening the box. I have some concerns about what other problems will surface after some use.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Good set of wrenches exactly as described.
customer_reviews.text: These are good wrenches for a good price when I bought. Exactly as the picture shows. I wanted the set with the larger sizes. Pretty sure these have the lifetime warranty. I have multiple sets of the gearwrench ratcheting wrenches but I've never had one fail on me yet. Don't use them to break bolts loose, they aren't meant for that. Break it loose with a regular wrench and then put this on it. I am a farmer and use them pretty regularly. These can be a huge timesaver in certain situations where only an end wrench will fit. There are some other brands that are stronger or have a shorter swing but for the price these are great.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Frustrating to use with no indication which direction you’re holding it
customer_reviews.text: Great set of wrenches, HOWEVER, I seriously wish they would have some type of indication on the wrench you can see and feel to know which side is loosen and which side is tighten. Its insanely annoying to try and have to figure out which way its going to turn every time you set it down. I tried painting one side at first, but the paint didn’t last long. Eventually I ended up taking my die grinder and carving a slight mark on one side that I could feel with my thumb and see.
customer_reviews.author: Real Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Mismatched wrench in the set.
customer_reviews.text: Great wrenches as I have had the metric set for quite a while. There was a hole in the packaging and one of the wrenches does not match the rest of the set. It was very dirty compared to the others. It is a different size and the logo is positioned differently (not centered) like the rest of the set. The 13/16” wrench is longer than the LARGER sized wrench above it. Great wrenches but 1 star because this has obviously been tampered with.
customer_reviews.author: Aidan B

customer_reviews.title: Didnt get what was advertised!!!
customer_reviews.text: product is honestly great until I open the package and all the wrenches are GearWrench except the 1/4 size wrench...for some reason they decided to put a craftsman 1/4 size wrench in place of the GearWrench one. would be nice to have a 1/4 size wrench sent to replace the craftsman one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product at a fair price
customer_reviews.text: Good product at a fair price. I bought a set "new" but it arrived wrapped in cellophane plastic and the wrenches had smudges and fingerprints on them. The 9/16, 1/2 and 3/8 showed slight use. I'm running the prints through IAFIS.
customer_reviews.author: @DTOM _1775

customer_reviews.title: Missing wrenches from the set
customer_reviews.text: package arrived today but the tape around the seams was ripped and the SAE wrenched had b loose from their packaging and were scattered around the box when I gathered them up I found one of wrenches under the inside flap but the 9/16 was completely missing when I examined the package further I noted that the tape along the bottom seam was completely torn open I think this allowed the wrench to slip out of the package.
customer_reviews.author: D. Renick

customer_reviews.title: See note
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. If I had to do it all over again. 1. Get reversible, flex and extra long. 2. Supplement with good extra long and slim combination open/closed wrench set for extra strength and troubled bolts. 3. Always purchase complete sets. Single oat 3x the price 4. Don’t question me
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Clark

customer_reviews.title: Solid built wrenches
customer_reviews.text: The wrenches are all solid quality built, of course they are its gearwrench. And they're the kings of ratcheting wrenches, they invented it so they know how to. My only small complaint is the rack it dont last long the wrenches start falling. They don't hold tight like they did in the beginning.
customer_reviews.author: The guy from that thing

customer_reviews.title: Numbers aren’t lining up
customer_reviews.text: I received 2x 15/16 and not 1inch. Check the wrench sizes
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money. Makes the job easier.
customer_reviews.text: These have made my job so much easier and faster. I can work these better than a ratchet and socket. The only downside may be that the head is a little bigger than a combo wrench, but for the most part they are fitting just fine. The quality and feel is very good. I like the fact that they don't have switch, I also own a gear wrench that has a switch, these are better. Just flip the wrench, the one with the switch can get tripped and is a little bigger. I can apply a lot of torque and have not had any sign of stripping or slipping.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Morgan

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: BOUGHT THIS TO WORK ON HELICOPTERS, I DONT EVER USE MY REGULAR WRENCH SET ANYMORE. NOT EVEN TO BREAK TQ ON NUTS. THE GEARS HAVE BEEN ABLE TO HANDLE IT ALL
customer_reviews.author: jesse

customer_reviews.title: Poor
customer_reviews.text: 3/4 wrench had the chrome vanadium coating flaking off, 13/16 is longer than than the 7/8, disappointed expected better from gearwrench
customer_reviews.author: richard

customer_reviews.title: Great set with the carrier included
customer_reviews.text: These are the original ratcheting end wrenches. They are solid and strong. The ratchet mechanism is very well made with no slop felt. I bought both the SAE and Metric sets. If you tinker, or are a serious mechanic, your tool box need these.
customer_reviews.author: Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Generally quite happy with these
customer_reviews.text: Generally quite happy with these, and considering the price, they're excellent. The ratchet ends are tight, have a good feel in use, and fit well to standard sized fastener heads. Minor gripes: -The flats on the open ends are rougher than I would like to see, which may lead to premature wear in the coating at these high spots
customer_reviews.author: Conor

customer_reviews.title: awesome wrenches
customer_reviews.text: I use these guys all day at the shop wrenching on cars so I bought some for the house love these tough little bastards
customer_reviews.author: HILLBILLY

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend. Strong, work great built tough
customer_reviews.text: These are strong, durable and simply awesome. Love the 5 degree matching. Hammer on the all day. Gearwrench is top notch. Worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Dana Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great tools.
customer_reviews.text: Used the same set a friend had. Definitely had to buy own. I now have metric and standard. Great tools.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: A little thick on the gear end.
customer_reviews.text: A little thick on the gear end, but they work great. Gear end wouldn't fit on the head-bolt of a IR 2475 pump, open end worked well didn't flex with torque, case it crap, wish they came in a roll up.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Summerlin

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the money

I have to move the wrench’s around so often and they tend to fall out now and then if I carry them by the handle. Other than that though I absolutely love them!

customer_reviews.title: Great set of tools
customer_reviews.text: Great set of tools, just grab entire set and go to work good price for a set that goes up to 1 inch , very satisfied

customer_reviews.title: No quality control
customer_reviews.text: Cheap ratcheting mechanism with terrible quality control. Out of the box the ratcheting gears were obviously messed up on 3 of the wrenches. One has a big tight spot that makes turning it dificult & makes me question the strength of the gears. The other two messed up wrenches have a lot of slop & free play in the gears compared to the others (which have a considerable amount of slop compared to higher quality ratcheting wrenches) For the price of this set I am very disappointed. For your average home owner this would probably be sufficient but even then the quality is questionable. I would not recommend these to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Barnett

customer_reviews.title: These appear to be as described. Knocked one star ...
customer_reviews.text: These appear to be as described. Knocked one star off as one of the wrenches has some rust on it.

customer_reviews.title: Good ratcheting wrench set
customer_reviews.text: By far the superior ratcheting wrench brand. I use these on a daily basis for greater than 2 years and am more than pleased with the quality of this tool. I prefer the non-reversible gear wrenches because they aren't prone to slipping a gear or reversing like other wrenches do. The price is right and the quality is there. Nuff said

customer_reviews.title: An amazing value, great set that covers most of my needs.
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say, aside from this being a great investment for me. This set covers the large majority of my daily needs working in a maintenance shop, and the holder keeps everything in place so I never have to go digging through the toolbox to find what I need.

customer_reviews.title: Good set

customer_reviews.title: 13 peices from 1/4" to 1", not 11/4" as advertized
customer_reviews.text: It is indeed 13 pieces. The product description clearly states in two places 1 1/4" as the largest wrench in the set. This is a typo or blatant bait and switch. Sure enough I opened the box and I had 13 pieces, 1/4" through 1". When I called to complain I was allowed to return the set. I wanted the set and kept it but was pissed that the 1 1/4" was instead 1/4". kind of like buying a foot long subway sandwich and getting a 6". Then being told to eat it and shut up or starve. Bs

These larger sizes are indispensable for doing any deck work. My only issue is the plastic holder itself. It's not very good and the wrenches fall out. I would have liked a roll up pouch in addition so that I could dump the plastic wall holder, and just put all the wrenches in a pouch which I could either lay out flat in my tool box, or roll up to take elsewhere.

product_meta.title: GEARWRENCH 13 Pc. 12 Pt. Ratcheting Combination Wrench Set, SAE - 9312
product_meta.description:
Drake off road tools kdt9312 features: Patented wrench locker rack holds wrenches in place for transporting and storage. 13 piece sae master combination Gear Wrench set. Includes: Includes the following sizes: 1¼" , 5/16" , 3/8" , 7/16" , ½" , 9/16" , 5/8" , 11/16" , ¾" , 13/16" , 7/8" , 15/16" , 1". Warranty: Sets & kits do not have warranty/ see individual pcs for details.

AMAZON.COM


13-piece set (view larger).Gearwrench combines the speed of a ratchet with the access and control of a wrench with this 13-piece SAE set of master ratcheting wrenches (model 9312). They offer the easy of 5 degrees of movement to turn fasteners, versus 30 degrees on standard combination wrenches. The small ratcheting box end head design enables access to tight spots where a ratchet won't fit. The open end allows ratcheting of nuts and bolts without removing the wrench from the fastener, making jobs go faster and easier. This set comes with a wrench locker rack that holds the wrenches in place for easy transport and storage.

WHAT'S IN THE BOX
13-piece SAE wrench set with molded wrench rack and the following sizes of wrenches:

> 1-1/4", 5/16", 3/8", 7/16", 1/2", 9/16", 5/8", 11/16", 3/4", 13/16", 7/8", 15/16", and 1"
ABOUT GEARWRENCH
Since launching the original patented 50 ratcheting wrench, GearWrench has continuously led with breakthroughs in pass-through ratchets, sockets, screw/nut drivers, pliers, and specialty tools. No matter the industry you find yourself in, GearWrench has the tools to fit your needs -- from the precise to the nearly indestructable. GearWrench hand tools are warranted for life to be free of defects in material and workmanship.

9312 13-PIECE SAE MASTER RATCHETING WRENCH SET
AT A GLANCE
 * 5-degree ratcheting arc
 * Sleek head design for access to tight spots
 * Surface Drive provides a stronger grip on fasteners and reduces rounding
 * Polished chrome finish
 * Lifetime warranty



FROM THE MANUFACTURER
It's all about performance. Gearwrench combines the speed of a ratchet with the access and control of a wrench. Ease of five-Degrees of movement to turn fasteners. Designed for tight spaces. Small ratcheting box end head design allows easy access to tight spots. Moves a fastener along any length threaded rod without removing the wrench from the fastener.

feature_bullets: 72 tooth ratcheting box end needs a minimal 5° to move fasteners vs. 30° for standard wrenches
Off-corner loading design on box end provides better grip and reduces fastener rounding
Thin head and beam provide greater access in confined work areas
Size conveniently stamped on both ends of the beam for quick identification
Manufactured from alloy steel for better strength and longer tool life
Bright, full polish chrome finish easily wipes clean and resists corrosion
Meets or exceeds ASME and ANSI specifications
Included rack for storage and organization
